channel.title: Outbreak on ruoran's epi notes
channel.description: Recent content in Outbreak on ruoran's epi notes

item.title: 在疫情爆发的初期应该发生什么?
item.description: I gave a talk in a COVID-19 seminar series organized by Harvard students（哈佛新冠讲座系列分享）on what should happen at the beginning of an outbreak, and field epidemiology training programs in the US and in China. You can find my slides here.

item.title: Doomsday Survival Code
item.description: I gave two lectures at the Public Health Symposium for Young Leaders in China, Feb 17, 2019, for 50+ high school students from several different regions in China. Click here for slides.
